## StandardGeometryKind enum

Standard kinds of geometry.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum StandardGeometryKind 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  All | <code>&quot;_all_&quot;</code> | Used in the enabledKinds/disabledKinds filter to match any kind. |
|  Area | <code>&quot;area&quot;</code> | Default value for the FillTechnique. |
|  Background | <code>&quot;background&quot;</code> | Background geometry. |
|  Border | <code>&quot;border&quot;</code> | Political borders. |
|  Building | <code>&quot;building&quot;</code> | Default value for the ExtrudedPolygonTechnique. |
|  Detail | <code>&quot;detail&quot;</code> | Anything that may show up last. |
|  Label | <code>&quot;label&quot;</code> | Default value for the TextTechnique, LineMarkerTechnique and the PoiTechnique. |
|  Line | <code>&quot;line&quot;</code> | Default value for all line techniques. |
|  Road | <code>&quot;road&quot;</code> | Basis for all roads. |
|  Terrain | <code>&quot;terrain&quot;</code> | Terrain geometry. |
|  Water | <code>&quot;water&quot;</code> | Default value for the FillTechnique. |
